title: Haddad takes aim at “super-rich” in G20 meeting
description:
Finance Minister Fernando Haddad told his counterparts at a G20 meeting on Wednesday that “there are no winners” in the current “globalization crisis,” and called for more taxation of those he called the “super-rich.” “We have reached an unsustainable situation, where the richest 1 percent own 43 percent of the world’s financial assets and emit […]

The post Haddad takes aim at “super-rich” in G20 meeting appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Explaining Brazil #282: After rally, is Bolsonaro stronger or in more trouble?
description:
Jair Bolsonaro got thousands of supporters on the streets of São Paulo. But the rally, although big in size, was no game changer for him

The post Explaining Brazil #282: After rally, is Bolsonaro stronger or in more trouble? appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
